item.title: 20 Oct 2012: Apache™ FOP 1.1 Released
item.description: Apache™ FOP 1.1 contains bug fixes and a number of new features. See Release Notes for a list of the most important changes.

item.title: 24 Feb 2012: New committer
item.description: Welcome Glenn Adams!

item.title: 17 Nov 2011: New committer
item.description: Welcome Mehdi Houshmand!

item.title: 21 Jul 2010: Apache™ FOP 1.0 Released
item.description: The Apache™ FOP team is delighted to present you a production grade release of the new FOP codebase. This release contains many bug fixes and new features. See the Release Notes for a list of the most important changes.

item.title: 14 Dec 2009: New committer
item.description: Welcome Pascal Sancho!

item.title: 5 Aug 2008: Apache™ FOP 0.95 Released
item.description: The Apache™ FOP team is delighted to present you a production grade release of the new FOP codebase. This release contains many bug fixes and new features. See the Release Notes for a list of the most important changes.

item.title: 16 Mar 2008: Apache™ FOP 0.95beta Released
item.description: The Apache™ FOP team is delighted to present you a beta version of the next production grade release of the new FOP codebase. This release contains many bug fixes and new features. See the Release Notes for a list of the most important changes.

item.title: 30 Oct 2007: New committer
item.description: Welcome Max Berger!

item.title: 15 Oct 2007: New Committer
item.description: Welcome Adrian Cumiskey!

item.title: 24 Aug 2007: Apache™ FOP 0.94 Released
item.description: The Apache™ FOP team is pleased to present you the second production grade release of the new FOP codebase. This release contains many bug fixes and new features. See the Release Notes for a list of the most important changes.

item.title: 26 Jan 2007: New Committer
item.description: Welcome Jay Bryant!

item.title: 9 Jan 2007: Apache™ FOP 0.93 released
item.description: The Apache™ FOP team is proud to present to you the first production grade release of the new FOP codebase. This release has the new API first introduced in release 0.92 beta. It contains again many bug fixes and new features.

item.title: 16 Oct 2006: New Committer
item.description: Welcome Vincent Hennebert!

item.title: 18 Apr 2006: Apache™ FOP 0.92 beta released
item.description: A second "beta" grade release of the new FOP codebase with a modified and now considered stable API. The release contains many bug fixes as well as new features mainly related to even more extensive support of the XSL-FO specification. This is expected to be the last "beta" release before we go to a 1.0 release!

item.title: 23 Dec 2005: Apache™ FOP 0.91 beta released
item.description: One month after the initial release we're happy present a "beta" grade release of the new FOP codebase. It's mostly a bug fix release but also contains a few new features. Thanks to all those who sent us feedback on the initial release!

item.title: 22 Nov 2005: Apache™ FOP 0.90 alpha 1 released
item.description:
The Apache™ FOP team is proud to present to you the largely rewritten codebase which is finally in a state where you can start to use it. It has taken over three years to get this far and over two years without a new release from the FOP project.
Please see also the announcement.

item.title: 8 Sep 2005: New Committer
item.description: Welcome Manuel Mall!

item.title: 20 Oct 2004: Creation of the Apache™ XML Graphics project
item.description: The Apache Board of Directors agreed to the creation of the Apache™ XML Graphics project which will be comprised of Batik and FOP. Both former Apache™ XML subprojects are in this way complying with the Board's desire to improve project oversight. Both project teams also see additional benefits of working more closely together.

item.title: 8 Oct 2004: New Committer
item.description: Welcome Luca Furini!

item.title: 24 Apr 2004: New Committer
item.description: Welcome Simon Pepping!

item.title: 7 Mar 2004: New Committer
item.description: Welcome Web Maestro Clay Leeds!

item.title: 10 Jan 2004: New Committers
item.description: Welcome Chris Bowditch and Andreas Delmelle!

item.title: 4 Jan 2004: New Committer
item.description: Welcome Finn Bock!

item.title: 29 Nov 2003: New Committer
item.description: Welcome Peter Herweg!

item.title: 18 Jul 2003: Apache™ FOP 0.20.5 released
item.description:
Changes since 0.20.4 include:
Added support for PDF encryption Perfomance tuning Fixed link hotspot positioning Fixed multi-threading issues Added support for CCITT Group 4 encoded TIFF files Dynamic JAI support Added autoselecting portrait/landscape for PCL and PS Renderer Added continued-label extension for tables Improved AWT Font-measuring/rendering Improved marker handling Fixed problem with jpegs with icc profile and acrobat reader 5 Added a fontBaseDir property TXTRenderer output encoding border-spacing support and a lot more bugfixes
See also the full text of the
announcement.

item.title: 29 Jun 2003: New Committer
item.description: Welcome Glen Mazza!

item.title: 23 May 2003: Apache™ FOP 0.20.5 Release Candidate 3 available
item.description: See the full text of the announcement.

item.title: 18 Feb 2003: Apache™ FOP 0.20.5 Release Candidate 2 available
item.description: See the full text of the announcement.

item.title: 2 Feb 2003: New XML PMC
item.description: Jeremias Maerki and Peter B. West are now representing FOP on the XML PMC.

item.title: 28 Jan 2003: FOP logo contest
item.description: We are looking for a new logo. FOP logo contest is started!

item.description: See FOP project pages at the ApacheWiki.

item.description: See the full text of the announcement.

item.title: 23 Nov 2002: EXLSFO project has been created
item.description: The EXSLFO project is a community effort to define functional extensions to thet XSL Formatting Objects specification. See the EXSLFO website for details.
